movie.title: Drive Hard
movie.description_intro: A former race car driver turned driver's training instructor (Jane) is abducted by a mysterious thief (Cusack) and forced to be the wheel-man for a crime that puts both in the sights of the cops and the mob and leads them all on a chase across Australia's Gold Coast.
movie.description_full: A former race car driver turned driver's training instructor (Jane) is abducted by a mysterious thief (Cusack) and forced to be the wheel-man for a crime that puts both in the sights of the cops and the mob and leads them all on a chase across Australia's Gold Coast.

movies.title: Family Guy Blue Harvest
movies.summary: With the Griffins stuck at home during a blackout, Peter tells the story of Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.
movies.description_full: With the Griffins stuck at home during a blackout, Peter tells the story of Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.

movies.title: Unhuman Nature
movies.summary: An FBI Agent with a troubled past finds himself on a case that nobody else wanted. Sent to the Pacific Northwest, Agent Raleigh becomes entangled in a deadly game that the locals prefer to keep a secret.
movies.description_full: An FBI Agent with a troubled past finds himself on a case that nobody else wanted. Sent to the Pacific Northwest, Agent Raleigh becomes entangled in a deadly game that the locals prefer to keep a secret.
movies.synopsis: An FBI Agent with a troubled past finds himself on a case that nobody else wanted. Sent to the Pacific Northwest, Agent Raleigh becomes entangled in a deadly game that the locals prefer to keep a secret.

movies.title: A Choo
movies.summary: Even when they were orphans, Wang Yizhi has always been in love with Xinxin. Now older, Yizhi decides to train as a boxer before he allows himself to profess his love, but only for her to fall for a geeky computer engineer who is secretly a popular superhero. When Xinxin gets kidnapped, Yizhi must prove his love and his fighting skills to get the girl of his dreams.

movies.title: Kung Fu Traveler
movies.summary: Aliens have invaded and overtaken the Earth. Trying to escape defeat, a Chinese General (Tiger Chen) is accidentally sent back in time while trying to devise a way to defeat the alien invaders. Stars Tiger Chen of "Man of Taichi" and "The Matrix"
